public abstract class Vertex extends Object implements Icon

  • Constructor Details

    • Vertex

      protected Vertex (Integer x, Integer y)
      Constructor which specifies the x-coordinate and y-coordinate in the cartesian coordinates. Further, the icon is set as non-selected by default.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate
      y - the y-coordinate
      See Also:
      • Vertex(Integer, Integer, boolean)

    • Vertex

      Constructor which specifies the x-coordinate, y-coordinate and whether the icon is selected.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate
      y - the y-coordinate
      selected - whether the icon is selected
